Posts.Content: kimmiecakes57 wrote: i have been dealing with fibroids and atypical lobular and ductal hyperplasia for the last 32 years. my mom was diagnosed with breast cancer last year.i am tired of all this and want to have my breasts removed so i don't get cancer. anyone else out there going through this? kim Log in to post a reply
